0110000000001010 0110110100111110 0 -> sum: 1100110101001000, cout: 0
1000001001110101 0000011000111010 0 -> sum: 1000100010101111, cout: 0

0110001010101101 0100100101001110 0 -> sum: 1010101111111011, cout: 0
0111111011001111 1001010011110100 0 -> sum: 0001001111000011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
